doc.title: Happy Chef: Not only Chef Happy, I also Happy
doc.text: This/DT stall/NN is/VBZ famous/JJ because/IN its/PRP$ owners/NNS had/VBD just/RB returned/JJ from/IN a/DT 15/CD year/NN stay/VB in/IN Sydney/NN where/WRB their/PRP$ restaurant/NN was/VBD voted/JJ Sydney/NN 's/POS top/NN 10/CD by/IN the/DT Sydney/JJ Morning/NN Herald/NN ./.
